about_the_game:
This is the original soundtrack for Artifact Adventure Gaiden DX.

The soundtrack is available in MP3 and WAV formats.

Comment from Bluffman (Developer):


First of all, I want to thank Shintaro Aoki and Tsuyomi for the amazing soundtrack they provided.

Aoki was in charge of the dungeons and fights while Tsuyomi worked on the cities and villages.

They have a different approach to track arrangement but both provide impactful pieces which add ambience to the game.
These are wonderful tracks that make you feel the atmosphere of every city, every battle.

And in the Three Tower bosses,
Tsuyomi's personality shines on each track.
Combined with the boss's brutal appearance, the result was very impressive.

From there, the flow from the last dungeon to the last battle and then on to the ending, which was handled by Aoki,
is a kind of a summary of the game. There is a passionate, sorrowful undertone throughout which carries you along.
I really want you to play and experience it.

If you like this great soundtrack, please play Artifact Adventure Gaiden DX!

There is a unity between the game-play and game music, they blend together to produce a fantastic gameplay experience!

bluffman
